Reviews.Content: Las Brisas not so tranquil Although you can't expect much from an $88. a night hotel, this was a disappointment. There was not even any linen available for the second bed. The hostess was rude. The water was cold. There is no breakfast or any ammenities. You get a roof over your head and little else. Staying here could ruin an otherwise beautiful stay. Also the location is terrible, right on a busy street where you can sit out on the balcony and observe heavy traffic. This is a motel, not a hotel.
Reviews.Author: Amelia333
